org.codeoverflow.chatoverflow.api.io.input

Interface SerialInput

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventInput<SerialEvent>, Input, Serializable

    public interface SerialInput
extends EventInput<SerialEvent>
    Connects to a device that is connected to your pc through a serial port (an Arduino for example) to receive data

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.InputStream getInputStream()
      Get a input stream to easily read all incoming data
      I suggest wrapping this with a BufferedInputStream or a BufferedReader
      default void registerDataAvailableEventHandler(java.util.function.Consumer<SerialDataAvailableEvent> eventHandler)
      Register an event handler that listens to all SerialDataAvailableEvent
